message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand that $150 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $200. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $175 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I'm willing to consider your offer of $175, but I was thinking more along the lines of $220. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
